invocations.description: Returns true if you have a premium account, false otherwise.
invocations.ex:
auto(1000, 2500)
if not $premium then 
	buyitemsmarket('premium scroll', 700000, 1, true, true)
end
invocations.exDescription: Each 1000~2500 milliseconds, check if you're premium and if you're not it'll buy a premium scroll in the market.
